name: The Dream Of A Lifetime
description:
In The Dream Of A Lifetime, you wake up in a strange world as a skeleton. Your job is to make it to the mountain, to find out where you are and why you are here.

This is the first game I've ever made. It was originally made for school, but i thought i might as well put it on here. I took a lot of inspiration  from Legend of Zelda, and most of the music comes from Legend of Zelda.
